
{{alias}}
    Glaisher-Kinkelin constant.

    The Glaisher-Kinkelin constant is defined as

                                     K(n  +  1)
    A  =  lim      -----------------------------------------
             n->oo   2                                 2
                    n  / 2  +  n / 2  +  1 / 12     - n  / 4
                   n                              e

    where

             ___ n - 1    k
    K(n)  =  | |         k
             | | k = 1

    is the K-function.

    Examples
    --------
    > {{alias}}
    1.2824271291006226

    See Also
    --------
